get.description: Gets this place's distance to the given place.

parameters.name: distanceUnit
parameters.description: The unit of distance: KM | MI [default]

parameters.name: toPlaceId
parameters.description: The distance to this place

parameters.name: placeId
parameters.description: Example value:

get.description: Get this place's current time in ISO-8601 format: HHmmss.SSSZ

parameters.name: placeId
parameters.description: Example value:

get.description: Get this place's current date-time in ISO-6801 format: yyyyMMdd'T'HHmmssZ

parameters.name: placeId
parameters.description: Example value:

get.description: Get the details for the containing populated place (e.g., its county or other administrative division), including location coordinates, population, and elevation above sea-level  (if available).   Currently, this data is highly dependent on whether the Wikidata **locatedIn** relation is properly defined. If you see an issue, please propose a change to the corresponding Wikidata entry.

parameters.name: placeId
parameters.description: Example value:

get.description: Get the details for a specific place, including location coordinates, population, and elevation above sea-level (if available).

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Display results in this language

parameters.name: asciiMode
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: placeId
parameters.description: Example value:

get.description: Get the details for the containing populated place (e.g., its county or other administrative division), including location coordinates, population, and elevation above sea-level  (if available).   Currently, this data is highly dependent on whether the Wikidata **locatedIn** relation is properly defined. If you see an issue, please propose a change to the corresponding Wikidata entry.

parameters.name: cityId
parameters.description: Example value: Q65

get.description: Get places near the given location, filtering by optional criteria.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Only places for these types (comma-delimited): ADM2 | CITY | ISLAND

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The location radius within which to find places

parameters.name: distanceUnit
parameters.description: The unit of distance to use: MI | KM

parameters.name: countryIds
parameters.description: Only places in these countries (comma-delimited country codes or WikiData ids)

parameters.name: excludedCountryIds
parameters.description: Only places NOT in these countries (comma-delimited country codes or WikiData ids)

parameters.name: timeZoneIds
parameters.description: Only places in these time-zones

parameters.name: minPopulation
parameters.description: Only places having at least this population

parameters.name: maxPopulation
parameters.description: Only places having no more than this population

parameters.name: namePrefix
parameters.description: Only places whose names start with this prefix. If languageCode is set, the prefix will be matched on the name as it appears in that language.

parameters.name: namePrefixDefaultLangResults
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Display results in this language

parameters.name: asciiMode
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: hateoasMode
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: Whether to include any places marked deleted: ALL | SINCE_YESTERDAY | SINCE_LAST_WEEK | NONE

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The zero-ary offset into the results

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: How to sort the results. Format: ±SORT_FIELD,±SORT_FIELD where SORT_FIELD = countryCode | elevation | name | population

parameters.name: locationid
parameters.description: Only cities near this location. Latitude/longitude in ISO-6709 format: ±DD.DDDD±DDD.DDDD

get.description: Find administrative divisions, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all known divisions with a population of at least 1000

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The location radius within which to find divisions

parameters.description: Only divisions having no more than this population

parameters.name: namePrefix
parameters.description: Only divisions whose names start with this prefix. If languageCode is set, the prefix will be matched on the name as it appears in that language.

parameters.name: namePrefixDefaultLangResults
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Display results in this language

parameters.name: asciiMode
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: hateoasMode
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: Whether to include any divisions marked deleted: ALL | SINCE_YESTERDAY | SINCE_LAST_WEEK | NONE

parameters.name: sort
